actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to report annually to Congress regarding the security reliability of the Nation's telecommunications network.
short_title: Telecommunications Network Security and Reliability Reporting Act of 1993

summary.text: Telecommunications Network Security and Reliability Reporting Act of 1993 - Directs the Federal Communications Commission to study and report annually to the Congress on security and reliability of the Nation's telecommunications network to: (1) identify the sources of its vulnerability to outrages; and (2) determine what default, redundancy, and recovery mechanisms are necessary to maintain and restore service.

titles.title: Telecommunications Network Security and Reliability Reporting Act of 1993
A bill to require the Federal Communications Commission to report annually to Congress regarding the security reliability of the Nation's telecommunications network.
